newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Incentive says finishes WABCO share sale.
newsitem.headline: Incentive says finishes WABCO share sale.

text.p: Sweden's Incentive said on Tuesday that it had finalised the sale of 10 million shares in U.S. Westinghouse Air Brake Company for a capital gain of 65 million crowns.
Incentive said in a statement the buyer was primarily Wabco itself which is redeeming its own shares and Vestar Capital which is a shareholder in the company.

Inventive has sold its entire holding in Wabco which generates proceeds of about 810 million crowns and a capital gain of about 65 million crown. The book value of the shareholding is 745 million crowns.
Incentive said its holding in Wabco was included in its aquisition of Investment AB Cardo.
